attributes.action: Stop the plundering of the Dee estuary
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the government is to show that it cares anything for angling and conservation it should do the following to protect the Dee as an important SSSI and a fishery.

1/ Stop illegal netting. 
2/ Spot checks on shrimp trawlers on species and quantity of by-catch. 
3/ A total ban on drift nets and trammel nets in contravention of EA Wales Sea Fishery Committee Byelaws.
4/ The extent of the Bass Nursery Site to be increased geographically to run on the “Headland to Headland Principle” as they are in all other estuaries in England and Wales.
5/ Byelaws to restrict the netting of flatfish and rays.
